metadata.title: CVE-2016-5041 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: dwarf_macro5.c in libdwarf before 20160923 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference) via a debugging information entry using DWARF5 and without a DW_AT_name.

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20160507-1').
